title: How to Redeem Sephora’s Birthday Gift (and What You Can Get)

steps.title: Log in to your Beauty Insider account.
steps.content: Log in to your Beauty Insider account. Those signed up for Sephora’s shopping rewards are called “Beauty Insiders,” and only those with an account can redeem a birthday gift. So, sign up or sign in to your account on Sephora.com . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make a purchase on Sephora’s website or app.
steps.content: Make a purchase on Sephora’s website or app. In order to claim your birthday gift online, you must buy something. Treat yourself to a birthday lip gloss, conditioner, or hair mask, and add it to your cart. There’s no minimum purchase amount, so order whatever merchandise you’d like, big or small.

steps.title: Click “Redeem Your Rewards” and select your gift.
steps.content: Click “Redeem Your Rewards” and select your gift. Proceed to checkout and select the “Redeem Your Rewards” option above the items in your cart. Pick the gift you’d like and place your order as usual. [2] X Research source If the birthday gifts don’t appear in “Redeem Your Rewards,” it may be because it isn’t your birth month or the wrong month is listed in your Beauty Insider account. Contact 1-877-SEPHORA if the correct birth month is listed in your account and you’re unable to claim your gift. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Head to your local Sephora.
steps.content: Head to your local Sephora. The cheapest and easiest way to redeem your birthday gift is by visiting a Sephora in person. So, take a trip during your birth month to the nearest Sephora. Only Beauty Insiders can claim a birthday gift from Sephora, so make sure you’re signed up before you go.

steps.title: Tell a Sephora Beauty Advisor that it’s your birth month.
steps.content: Tell a Sephora Beauty Advisor that it’s your birth month. Go to the checkout counter or locate an Advisor on the floor. Let them know that you’re a Beauty Insider and you’re there to redeem your birthday gift. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Pick your gift from their available selection.
steps.content: Pick your gift from their available selection. The in-store selection for birthday gifts may be smaller than the online selection due to in-store stock. If your store doesn’t have the birthday item you wanted in stock, ask if another nearby store does or order online. You don’t need to make a purchase to redeem your gift in-store, but that doesn’t mean you can’t treat yourself! Browse the aisles before or after you select your birthday gift if you’d like.

steps.title: Sephora’s birthday gifts change every year.
steps.content: Sephora’s birthday gifts change every year. The new year’s selection is released at the start of the year. Every Beauty Insider can select 1 of 5 options for their gift, while VIBs and Rouge clients can choose from 6. [5] X Research source Here’s the line-up for 2023: [6] X Research source Ilia Makeup Birthday Gift Set: This makeup set includes a black lengthening and curling mascara and a multi-stick for cheeks and lips. Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Skincare Birthday Gift Set : This sweet smelling set includes a mini highlighting serum and hydrating toner. Dior Fragrance Birthday Gift Set : This popular fragrance package includes mini Miss Dior and Sauvage perfumes. Due to popular demand, this gift is currently unavailable online and must be redeemed in stores. Ouai “The Ouai of Life” Birthday Gift Set : This hair and body package includes a mini clarifying shampoo, a mini leave-in conditioner, a mini body cleanser, and a mini rose fragrance. Farmacy Clean Skincare Birthday Gift Set: This gift is exclusive to VIB and Rouge clients and includes 3 mini products to cleanse, moisturize, and hydrate the face. 250 Bonus Points: If the above gifts don’t tickle your fancy, choose to add 250 bonus points to your Beauty Insider Account for Rewards Bazaar or BI Cash.
